nodes.text: Kelly "Valara" Knox is a former Senior Community Relations Representative for Star Wars Galaxies and now work as a freelance writer.

Kelly Knox began working with the Star Wars Galaxies community for Sony Online Entertainment in May of 2007. During her time with the Star Wars Galaxies team, she was responsible for working on web site content, writing Friday Features, posting the spotlights for the week, choosing the Galactic Showcase, and more.
Knox is currently a freelance writer and a contributor to StarWars.com.
